Reason: The configuration option 'slow_query_log_timeout_in_ms' in the Cassandra software project is performance-sensitive because changing its value can significantly impact system performance. A lower value may result in faster query logging but could potentially overload the system with excessive logging, leading to increased execution time and memory consumption. On the other hand, a higher value may delay query logging, impacting system responsiveness and overall performance. Therefore, any change in this configuration can have notable variations in execution time and memory consumption, making it performance-sensitive.
